metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9605 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in cobbler software component version 2.6.11-1. It suffers from an invalid parameter validation vulnerability, leading the arbitrary file reading. The flaw is triggered by navigating to a vulnerable URL via cobbler-web on a default installation.

notes.Note: jdstrand> maas-provision in 12.04 is a code copy of cobbler, but with reduced features and usage. Only the portions of maas-provision specifically used by maas will recieve official support

criterions.comment: cobbler: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
